articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Newly-built Samjiyon Potato Farina Production Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Newly-built Samjiyon Potato Farina Production Factory
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the newly-built Samjiyon Potato Farina Production Factory.
					 He was briefed on the factory before a map showing the bird's eye view of it.
					
					 The factory, with a total floor space of 27,920 square meters and a yearly production capacity of 4 000 tons, consists of potato farina production building, processed potato production building, 20,000 ton-level potato storage, auxiliary building and workers' hostel.
					
					 Going round combined control room, potato farina workshop, products show room, cultural and welfare establishments, sci-tech learning space, potato storage and other parts of the factory, Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un acquainted himself in detail with its construction and production.
					
					 He noted that the farina production process, ranging from raw material feeding, husking, washing, selecting, piece cutting, hot water handling, cooling, boiling, drying and milling to packing, has been highly automated and streamlined and its modernization level is very high.
					
					 He said that more equipment and facilities of various kinds for the production of processed potato should be installed additionally at the factory to turn out in a larger quantity such processed potato products as nutritive rice, slice fry, twist, noodle and Udong as well as farina and thus make them known to the whole country as special products of Samjiyon County.
					
					 He set forth the tasks for the management and operation of the factory, urging it to fully play its role as a factory giving substantial benefit to the people by putting its production on a normal track and turning out much more processed potato products.
					
					 Saying that visitors to the revolutionary battlefields in Ryanggang and other people would be glad to see processed potato products being turned out at the Samjiyon Potato Farina Production Factory, he highly appreciated the feats of the builders, scientists and technicians who contributed to building the factory wonderfully.
					
					 It is a rare and nice factory flawless in all aspects and a model factory in our country's potato processing industry, he said, adding that it would have been better to build this modern farina factory before long ago and show it to leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Supreme Leader expressed expectation and belief that the officials and employees of the factory would fully discharge their honorable duty, and had a photo session with them.
					
					 Accompanying him were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Kim Yong Su, department director of the WPK Central Committee, and Jo Yong Won, vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and Kim Ung Chol and Ma Won Chun, directors of the State Affairs Commission.

articles.title: Congratulations to Zimbabwean FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Zimbabwean FM
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho on Dec. 4 sent a congratulatory message to Sibusiso Moyo upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and International Trade of Zimbabwe.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with a long history and tradition would steadily strengthen and wished him success in his work.

articles.title: Talks between DPRK Vice FM and UN Under-Secretary-General
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK Vice FM and UN Under-Secretary-General
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between Pak Myong Guk, vice minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, and Jeffrey Feltman, under-secretary-general of the United Nations, here on Wednesday.
					 Views on cooperation between the DPRK and the UN Secretariat, assistance to the DPRK from the UN organizations and other matters of mutual concern were exchanged at the talks.

articles.title: Treaty Signed between DPRK and Russia
articles.content:
Treaty Signed between DPRK and Russia
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- A treaty of extradition of those given a verdict of deprivation of freedom between the DPRK and the Russian Federation was signed in Moscow on Dec. 5.
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were the delegation of the Central Court of the DPRK headed by President Kang Yun Sok and DPRK Ambassador to Russia Kim Hyong Jun and from the Russian side were Minister of Justice Alexandr Konovalov and those concerned.
					
					 The treaty was inked by Kang Yun Sok and Alexandr Konovalov.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Blasts American High-level Politicians for Making Reckless Remarks about DPRK
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Blasts American High-level Politicians for Making Reckless Remarks about DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on Wednesday as regards the fact that high-level politicians of the U.S. are now constantly making reckless remarks about our country.
					 Recently, as the U.S. is conducting the largest-ever joint aerial drill on the Korean peninsula targeting the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK), its high-level politicians are showing alarming signs by making bellicose remarks one after another.
					
					 The national security advisor of the White House and a Republican senator said that "the chances of war with north Korea" are increasing every day, a "preemptive war" with north Korea is becoming more likely, the families and dependents of the U.S. troops should be moved out of south Korea. These confrontational warmongering remarks cannot be interpreted in any other way but as a warning to us to be prepared for a war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Worse still, the CIA director has made a provocation against us by impudently criticizing our supreme leadership which is the heart of our people. This is the revelation of the U.S. cunning and heinous intention which is to instigate our strong countermeasures and use them to ignite the fuse for a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The large-scale nuclear war exercises conducted by the U.S. in succession are creating touch-and-go situation on the Korean peninsula and series of violent war remarks coming from the U.S. high-level politicians amid such circumstances have made an outbreak of war on the Korean peninsula an established fact. The remaining question now is: when will the war break out.
					
					 The careless remarks of war by the inner circle of Trump and the reckless military moves by the U.S. substantiate that the current U.S. administration has made a decision to provoke a war on the Korean peninsula and is taking a step-by-step approach to get there.
					
					 The world should not harbor any prejudice in discerning who the main culprit behind the tense situation on the Korean peninsula is and who the violator of world peace and stability is.
					
					 The U.S. is going frantic in advertising the nuclear war on the Korean peninsula every day and this invites our due vigilance.
					
					 We do not wish for a war but shall not hide from it, and should the U.S. miscalculate our patience and light the fuse for a nuclear war, we will surely make the U.S. dearly pay the consequences with our mighty nuclear force which we have consistently strengthened.
					
					 If the U.S. does not want to be burnt to death by the fire it ignites, it would better behave with prudence and caution.

articles.title: Army-People Rallies Hail Success in ICBM Test-fire
articles.content:
Army-People Rallies Hail Success in ICBM Test-fire
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies took place in North Phyongan and North Hamgyong provinces on Wednesday to hail the great victory in realizing the historic cause of completing the state nuclear force, the cause of building a rocket power under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Attending them were officials of local party, power organs and working people's organizations, factories, enterprises, farms and universities, officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people from all walks of life and youths and students.
					
					 The statement of the DPRK government was read out to be followed by congratulatory speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that the great success in the test-fire of the new type inter-continental ballistic rocket which powerfully demonstrated the validity and the invincibility of the WPK's line of simultaneous development of the two fronts excited the whole country.
					
					 The March 18 revolution, July 4 revolution, the miraculous victory on July 28 and the H-bomb test on September 3 were followed by the birth of the most powerful intercontinental ballistic rocket thanks to the devotion and the painstaking efforts made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, they said.
					
					 The admirable victory which ended the history of nuclear blackmail and threat by the U.S. imperialists will brilliantly remain in the history of the country as the heroic myth of socialist Korea, they stressed.

articles.title: December 15 Quality Medals Awarded to Best Products
articles.content:
December 15 Quality Medals Awarded to Best Products
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture here on Wednesday to award the December 15 Quality Medal to the best products made in the country in Juche 106 (2017).
					 Medals and diplomas were awarded to seven products estimated as the home-made best goods.

articles.title: Sanggyong Stone Lantern
articles.content:
Sanggyong Stone Lantern 
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The Sanggyong stone lantern is one of historical remains of Palhae (698-926) that succeeded Koguryo (B.C. 277-A.D. 668). It stands at the site of a temple in Sanggyongryongchonbu, the walled capital city of Palhae, which serves as a precious evidence for the shift in stone lantern culture of Korea.
					 The Sanggyong stone lantern, expected to be built in the mid-eighth century, is a grand combination of superior architecture and sculptural art.
					
					 The stone lantern was 6.3 meters high, but some of its upper parts got lost. 
					
					 It mainly consisted of four parts--base, prop, fire box and roofing.
					
					 It also belongs to the group of the oldest and largest fine stone lanterns in different Asian countries, including Korea, and is considered to have great influence on building stone lanterns and pagodas in Koryo (918-1392) and its neighboring countries.

articles.title: Cultivation of "Aegukphul" Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Cultivation of "Aegukphul" Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has made achievements in cultivating "Aegukphul", a high-yielding and nutritive feed crop, on a nationwide scale.
					 Its seedlings have been already transplanted to different parts of the country.
					
					 Pyongyang City expanded its cultivation area and produced enough seedlings by putting its cultivation on a scientific basis.
					
					 North Phyongan Province organized passing-on-technique conferences on biological characters of "Aegukphul" and sci-tech problems arising in its cultivation.
					
					 Kangwon Province and other provinces have also produced many seedlings by fertilizing and tending its growing areas in a scientific way.
					
					 And due measures have been taken for the safekeeping of seedlings in winter.

articles.title: U.S. Is Target of Main Attack: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Is Target of Main Attack: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The target of main attack in the global cause of independence is the U.S., an article of Rodong Sinmun says Wednesday.
					 The biggest reactionary forces challenging the struggle for realizing the world independence while creating obstacles in the way are none other than the U.S. seeking the world hegemony, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. harboring inveterate repugnancy against other countries and nations resort to interference in the internal affairs for regime changes, aggression and man-slaughter while going against the trend of the times for independence. By putting its law above international law, the U.S. is measuring everything with its law as a yardstick, interfering in the internal affairs of others at will and putting political, economic and diplomatic pressure on them.
					
					 It is branding those countries incurring its displeasure as "state sponsors of terrorism", "human rights abusers" and "dictatorial states", ordering them to do this or that. If that does not work, it is trying to use force.
					
					 It is the despicable nature of the U.S. imperialists to go ferocious to weak partners but yield to those adopting tough stand.
					
					 Evading struggle with the U.S. imperialists would offer them further momentum for aggression moves and only increase the danger of a war.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Servile to U.S. Leads to Disgrace and Death: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Servile to U.S. Leads to Disgrace and Death: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities' clinging to the policy servile to the U.S. and cooperation with outside forces is the anti-reunification treacherous act that aggravates the deteriorated inter-Korean relations, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean chief executive pretended as if he behaved independently in the relations with the U.S., claiming that the destiny of the nation should be "decided by itself" and it is necessary to be ready to say "no to the U.S." But this is no more than deception and bluff.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are actively joining the Trump group in its reckless moves for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK while currying favor with their master.
					
					 They easily talk about the removal of evils while styling themselves as "candlelight regime", but there is no difference from the puppet conservative group in the servile to the U.S. and the confrontation with compatriots in the north.
					
					 The present deteriorated inter-Korean relations are an inevitable result of treacherous action of the puppet authorities turning back on the compatriots and getting hell-bent on sanctions and military provocations against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. while following the confrontation with the compatriots pursued by the preceding conservative regimes.
					
					 The present situation goes to clearly prove that the inter-Korean relations can never be free from the catastrophic phase as long as the south Korean authorities are steadily clinging to the policy servile to the U.S.
					
					 Kowtowing to the U.S. leads to disgrace and death. If the puppet authorities are making desperate efforts for the cooperation in sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK in league with the U.S., disregarding the future of inter-Korean relations and destiny of the nation, they would meet miserable doom.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Resorting to Sharing Information with U.S., Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Resorting to Sharing Information with U.S., Japan
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities at the talks with Trump had already agreed to increase sharing information, and these days they are consulting with the U.S. on the issues of mutual exchange of personnel, video and news information and improvement of information in quality and quantity.
					 In the wake of one year extension of the period of the agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan, they decided to increase two more emergency direct phone circuits from one circuit for information exchange with Japan.
					
					 This is part of preparations for a war of aggression against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and a dangerous collusion and nexus bringing heavy clouds of a war to the sky above the Korean peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities' frantic moves to increase sharing information with their masters U.S. and Japan are part of the moves to establish the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance for realizing the strategy for dominating Northeast Asia by invading the DPRK and laying a siege to surrounding countries. 
					
					 The south Korean chief executive frequently touted "ruling out of a war", "peaceful settlement" and "no to triangular military alliance". This was, after all, cheap fig-leaf for fooling public opinion at home and abroad and hiding his bellicose nature. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities are adding to thrice-cursed crimes before the nation, preoccupied with the pipedream of stifling the compatriots in the north in collusion with outside forces. They would be well advised to think twice about what miserable and disastrous consequences are to be entailed by their crimes.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Regime's Rhetoric about "Dialogue"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Regime's Rhetoric about "Dialogue"
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Minister Jo Myong Gyun and other coteries of the south Korean puppet unification ministry come under fire by Minju Joson Wednesday as they dared to find fault with the DPRK at the end of crying out for "effectiveness of the suggestion for dialogue", "detente" and "alleviation of the pain of division".
					 A commentary of the paper says that their call for "dialogue" to give impression that they are interested in the improvement of the north-south relations is the height of shamelessness.
					
					 The rhetoric about "dialogue" is an expression of their sordid design to force the DPRK to lay down arms and bring down the social system in the DPRK by taking advantages of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, not an expression of their concern for defusing tension on the Korean peninsula and alleviating the pain of division, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 Such despicable rhetoric would only bring into bolder relief the dirty nature of the puppet forces going reckless to destroy peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and to inflict the nuclear holocaust on the nation in collusion with the U.S. which is imposing the pain of division on the nation.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities have to depart from their policy of kowtowing to the U.S. line if they truly want detente and alleviation of the pain of national division.
					
					 If they keep escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen and staging war moves in pursuance of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, they can never evade stern punishment by history and the nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Censures S. Korean Regime's Act of Treachery
articles.content:
Minju Joson Censures S. Korean Regime's Act of Treachery
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The heads of south Korean puppet defense and foreign ministries solicited for the expansion of the rotational deployment of the U.S. strategic assets in south Korea and for sustained "strengthening of alliance", saying that "close cooperation with the U.S. serves as a powerful deterrence message to the north" when meeting the delegation of the Armed Services Committee of the House of Representatives and other Americans during their recent visits to Seoul.
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Wednesday brands this as a senseless act of sycophancy and treachery aimed to offer south Korea as a nuclear logistic base for aggression and as a nuclear war offering to the U.S.
					
					 The "close cooperation" touted by the puppet forces is aimed to put pressure on the fellow countrymen and thus realize their despicable ambition for "unification through absorption", the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet forces asked their master to expand the rotational deployment of the U.S. nuclear strategic assets. This is a dangerous act to push the situation to an unpredictable phase.
					
					 It is the south Korea-U.S. "alliance" that is rendering the situation on the Korean peninsula tenser, because it is an "alliance" for war and aggression aimed to bring down the DPRK by force.
					
					 The situation eloquently proves that the present south Korean authorities are following in the footsteps of the preceding regime which pursued the traitorous policy of escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen while crying out for cooperation with aggression-minded outsiders.

articles.title: Japan's Moves for Overseas Expansion Censured by Researcher
articles.content:
Japan's Moves for Overseas Expansion Censured by Researcher
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday carries a commentary titled "We should guard against Japan's moves for overseas expansion" written by Ra Myong Song, researcher of the Institute for Japan Studies.
					 The commentary refers to the recent conclusion of an agreement on the use of a military base between Japan and Djibouti.
					
					 It says:
					
					 In a word, the agreement calls for Djibouti to additionally lease lot for the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" under the pretext of their participation in the "anti-piracy campaign" in Aden Gulf.
					
					 The SDF's military base has already located there. It is said that Japan built the base for the first time after the Second World War in order to contain the increasing influence of China in Africa.
					
					 Japan put up the signboard of the "anti-piracy campaign" in a cynical ploy to justify its overseas troop dispatch and the establishment of military bases.
					
					 Japan's open establishment of military bases in other countries is a dangerous attempt to lay a stepping stone for overseas aggression.
					
					 As well known, Japan is a criminal state and the defeated nation. Being disarmed after its defeat, Japan is barred from exercising the right of collective self-defense by law. However, Japan has expanded the military operational sphere of the SDF to Asia and the rest of the world and provided legal foundations for conducting a military action for aggression in any region under the pretence of "supporting" its allies such as the U.S. forces.
					
					 Today the present ruling quarters of Japan are working hard to press ahead with the retrogressive revision of the constitution which would newly specify the existence of the SDF in order to legalize their overseas aggression. By doing so, they are mulling turning Japan into a war state invading the Asia-Pacific region just like what it did in the past.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Vow to Fight Out for Withdrawal of THAAD
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Vow to Fight Out for Withdrawal of THAAD
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The 6th Sosong-ri all-people peace action meeting was reportedly held in North Kyongsang Province with the attendance of more than 400 members from sixth civic and social organizations including the Songju Committee for Struggle against THAAD Deployment on Dec. 2.
					 The speakers called for vigorous struggle for the repeal of THAAD deployment and the peace of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Through a resolution, the participants expressed their will to make efforts to prevent the project of installing THAAD in 2018 and get it withdrawn.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, they took a demonstration.

articles.title: Repeal of SL Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repeal of SL Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea reportedly issued a statement on Tuesday to disclose the injustice of the fascist "Security Law" and demand its repeal.
					 The statement referred to the fact that members of the organization who were indicted for violation of the SL were found no guilty.
					
					 It urged the "government" to repeal at once the SL, an evil law against human rights, democracy and reunification which carried forward the Maintenance of the Public Order Act dating back to the period of the Japanese imperialists' rule.

articles.title: De-pollution of U.S. Military Base Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
De-pollution of U.S. Military Base Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The puppet authorities of south Korea were forced by the strong public protest to make public the results of investigation into the polluted U.S. military base in Ryongsan on November 29.
					 The results showed that pollution by benzene inside the base is 672 times, toluene 7.6 times and ethyl-benzene 6.5 times the tolerance limits and outside the base benzene is 470 times, toluene 2.7 times and ethyl-benzene 4.9 times.
					
					 Enraged at the results, the Inhabitants Association for Properly Retaking U.S. Military Base in Ryongsan held a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 1, demanding the full-scale investigation into the Ryongsan base and its immediate de-pollution.
					
					 Speakers contended that the U.S. forces in south Korea should take responsibility for the environmental pollution and immediately start its de-pollution.

articles.title: Arrest of Lee Myung Bak Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Arrest of Lee Myung Bak Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Voice of Seoul, citizens of various circles launched a struggle in Seoul on Dec. 2 to demand the arrest and investigation of traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					 They went on a demo along streets for one and a half hours, chanting slogans such as "Arrest Lee Myung Bak!"
					
					 At the end of the demo, they headed for Lee's house but were barred by fascist policemen.
					
					 They announced a questionnaire condemning the traitor's crimes.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Aerial Drill Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Aerial Drill Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Actions have been fiercely staged across south Korea in protest against the largest-ever joint aerial drill targeting the DPRK kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers, according to reports.
					 The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification held rallies and demonstrations outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul and U.S. military base in Kunsan and air force base in Kwangju where the 1st combat flying corps of the puppet air force is stationed on Monday.
					
					 On the same day press conferences were held at U.S. air force base in Osan by the Solidarity for People's Sovereignty and the World Women's Peace Action against THAAD and War.
					
					 The South Kyongsang Provincial Progressive Federation and the Kyonggi Headquarters for Actions against Trump and the U.S. also held news conferences at the South Kyongsang Provincial Office and outside the U.S. military base in Phyongthaek on Tuesday to strongly denounce the joint aerial drill.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) - Seminars on exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Bangladesh, the Czech Republic, Uganda, Ethiopia and Mexico from Nov. 6 to 30 on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of his demise.
					Present there were personages of various circles and masses in relevant countries.
					
					The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party and the chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea and the chairman of the Group for the Study of Songun Politics of Bangladesh praised Kim Jong Il as the great politician and tender-hearted father of the people who dedicated his all to the country's prosperity and development and people's happiness till the last moments of his life.
					
					The honorary chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said it was the great exploit performed by Kim Jong Il that he firmly defended socialism, smashing the U.S. imperialists and their followers' ever more vicious moves for stifling the DPRK with the collapse of socialism in various countries as a momentum.
					
					The chairman of the Ethiopian National Committee for Remembering HE Kim Jong Il highly lauded him as the rare thinker and theoretician and iron-willed and brilliant commander who provided the powerful ideo-theoretical weapon for victory of the socialist cause and a tremendous military guarantee of Juche Korea.
					
					  The chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism also praised Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Bangladeshi Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Bangladeshi Political Figure
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Mostafa Jamal Haider, secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, issued a statement on Nov. 21 on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He said:
					
					 The world progressives are recollecting once again the immortal exploits performed by HE Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, in making the Korean revolution and accomplishing the global cause of independence on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of his demise.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il achieved the great exploits guaranteeing the eternal foundation of socialist Korea and its rosy future.
					
					 Thanks to him, the Juche idea and Songun idea are shining as the great guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 He turned the Workers' Party of Korea into the ever-victorious guiding force, the DPRK into the invincible socialist state, the Korean People's Army into the matchless one and the whole society into a large family with his politics of love and trust.
					
					 The DPRK has provided the firm foundation capable of adhering to and dynamically advancing socialism despite the raging wind of history.
					
					 His exploits will always be cherished in the hearts of the Korean people and world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Brief Biography Introduced by Mexican Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Brief Biography Introduced by Mexican Website
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk was posted on the Mexican website Friends of Korea on November 27 with the approach of the centenary of her birth.

articles.title: German, Nepalese Organizations Slam U.S. for Re-listing DPRK as "State Sponsor of Terrorism"
articles.content:
German, Nepalese Organizations Slam U.S. for Re-listing DPRK as "State Sponsor of Terrorism"
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- German and Nepalese organizations issued statements on Nov. 23 and 24 denouncing the U.S. for re-listing the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism".
					 The Berlin Juche Idea Study Group of Germany said that the U.S. dared to re-list the dignified DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism" and staged the farce of slapping additional sanctions against it.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The sordid behavior of the U.S. is a wanton violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK and a clear state terrorism against it.
					
					 The U.S. is the biggest state sponsor of terrorism on earth as it makes no scruple of carrying out state terrorism against the independent and progressive countries.
					
					 The DPRK dignified to be a proud nuclear weapons state has put a definite end to the U.S. monopoly of nuclear weapons. 
					
					 We denounce the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and extend full support to the struggle of the Korean people.
					
					 The Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics stressed as follows:
					
					 The U.S. behavior of re-listing the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism" is a serious provocation hurting the dignity of the DPRK rising day by day in the international arena.
					
					 The DPRK, safeguarding peace and international justice and respecting human rights, holds fast to the consistent stand opposing all forms of terrorism.
					
					 Re-listing the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism" can never be pardoned.
					
					 We strongly reject the groundless mud-slinging at the sovereign state.

articles.title: Statement of DPRK Government Supported by Beninese Organizations
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK Government Supported by Beninese Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on November 29 in support of the statement of the DPRK government.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We warmly congratulate the Korean army and people upon having realized the historic great cause of completing the state nuclear force, the cause of building a rocket power under the wise leadership of respected HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK demonstrated its dignity and might once again before the whole world by successfully test-firing the newly-developed ICBM Hwasong-15.
					
					 It clearly showed that no force could block the road of Juche Korea advancing toward a powerful socialist country.
					
					 We fully support the statement of the DPRK government, convinced that the Korean people, who united close around HE Kim Jong Un, would surely win victory in their struggle for building a powerful socialist nation and achieving reunification of the country, true to the new line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, the eternal banner for defending peace.

articles.title: Joint Air Drill of U.S. and S. Korea Denounced by Russian VIP
articles.content:
Joint Air Drill of U.S. and S. Korea Denounced by Russian VIP
 Moscow, December 4 (KCNA) -- The first vice-chairman of the National Defence Committee of the State Duma of Russia denounced the largest-ever joint aerial drill kicked off by the U.S. and south Korea recently as a provocation.
					 He said that the drill does not help stabilize the tense situation around the Korean peninsula, adding that the present situation is so tense that a single flame is enough to spill over into a conflagration.
					
					 He said the Russian leadership has repeatedly stressed that the escalation of the military exercises in the region can never be tolerated, noting that the stabilizing of the tense situation means refrain from creating the war threat in the region.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The present drill which takes place around the boundary with north Korea is a provocation. The U.S. is ill-famed for always irritating the states which do not act under its preset orbit. At present such thing is occurring. It is long since the words unipolar world disappeared. But regretfully, the American administration remains unchanged in its behavior and still regards itself as "an international gendarme."

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita la Fabrica de Harina de Patata de Samjiyon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita la Fabrica de Harina de Patata de Samjiyon
Pyongyang, 6 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la recien construida Fabrica de Harina de Patata de Samjiyon.
					Ante todo, el escucho las explicaciones ante el plano de vista a vuelo de pajaro de la fabrica.
					
					Esta planta con una superficie arquitectonica de mas de 27 mil 920 metros cuadrados y la capacidad de produccion anual de 4 mil toneladas consta de los edificios de produccion de harina y productos elaborados de patata, el almacen de patatas de 20 mil toneladas, el edificio auxiliar y el albergue de obreros.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente recorrio la sala de control general, el taller de harina de patata, la sala de muestras, el establecimiento de cultura y servicio publico, la sala de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas, el deposito de patatas y otros puntos de la fabrica haciendo conocimiento detallado del estado de construccion y produccion.
					
					Evaluo de alto el nivel de modernizacion diciendo que son automatizados y encadenados los procesos de produccion inclusive la introduccion de materias primas, el descortezamiento, la lavadura, la seleccion, el corte, el tratamiento con agua caliente, la refrigeracion, el cocimiento, la secada, la molienda y el embalaje.
					
					Al instalar en esta fabrica mas equipos productivos, hay que fabricar con patata mucho mas articulos elaborados ademas de la harina como el arroz nutritivo, las rebanadas fritas de patata, la rosquilla, el fideo y el espagueti para que estos se conozcan en todo el pais como productos especiales del distrito Samjiyon, instruyo.
					
					Esta fabrica debe producir mucho mas articulos elaborados de patata en el fragor de la campana de normalizacion de la produccion y cumplir asi su papel de entidad que beneficia realmente al pueblo, dijo y presento las tareas importantes que se presentan en la administracion de ella.
					
					Reconocio los meritos de trabajo de los constructores, cientificos y tecnicos que construyeron magnificamente la fabrica, diciendo que cuando ella produzca en grandes cantidades los alimentos de patata, se pondrian muy contentos los participantes en el recorrido por los lugares de batalla revolucionaria en la provincia de Ryanggang y los habitantes locales. 
					
					 Esta planta es maravillosa, elegante y perfecta por dentro y por fuera y la ejemplar de la industria de elaboracion de patata de nuestro pais, califico y expreso que cuan bueno habria sido si la hubiera construido antes para mostrarla al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Al final, se fotografio con los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos cumpliran bien su honrosa tarea.
					
					  Le acompanaron en esta visita Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Su, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won, y los directores del Comite de Estado, Kim Ung Chol y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Investigador coreano alerta sobre el expansionismo a ultramar de Japon
articles.content:
Investigador coreano alerta sobre el expansionismo a ultramar de Japon
Pyongyang, 6 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun transmitio hoy el comentario del investigador del Instituto de los Asuntos Japoneses, Ra Myong Song, intitulado "Hay que tomar precaucion de las maniobras expansionistas a ultramar de Japon".
					El comentario recuerda que hace poco, se firmo entre Japon y Djibouti el acuerdo relativo al uso de la base militar, y continua:
					
					De acuerdo con su contenido resumido, las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon alquilaran nuevo terreno en Djibouti y lo usaran bajo el rotulo de tomar parte en la "lucha anti-pirateria" en el Golfo de Aden.
					
					Ya en ese lugar existe una base militar de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" que segun trascendidos, fue construida por Japon por primera vez despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial con el objetivo de contrarrestar las crecientes influencias de China en Africa.
					
					Japon levanto el cartel de "lucha anti-pirateria" para justificar el envio a ultramar de sus fuerzas armadas y la instalacion de bases militares en el extranjero que significa el peligroso intento de preparar la base de agresion a otros paises.
					
					Como todos conocen, Japon es el pais criminal y derrotado en la guerra al que se le ha privado por la ley del derecho a la autodefensa colectiva. 
					
					Sin embargo, el pais isla extendio el teatro operacional de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" a vastas zonas de Asia y el resto del mundo y preparo la base legal para desarrollar las actividades militares agresivas en cualquier region del mundo bajo el pretexto de "apoyo" a sus aliados, incluso las tropas norteamericanas.
					
					Para ese fin, los actuales gobernantes japoneses intentan impulsar por la fuerza el proyecto de enmienda de la Constitucion que estipula nuevamente el estatus de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa".
					
					De esa manera, tratan de convertir su pais en el Estado agresor y belico que puede dominar la region de Asia-Pacifico al igual que en el siglo pasado.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena el intento de compartir mas informaciones para la guerra anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena el intento de compartir mas informaciones para la guerra anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 6 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, los titeres surcoreanos acordaron en las conversaciones con Trump ampliar el volumen de informaciones compartidas.
					En estos dias, discuten con EE.UU. el problema de intercambiar las informaciones de recursos humanos, imagenes y comunicaciones y mejorarlas en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo.
					
					Por otra parte, decidieron dar un ano de prorroga al convenio de proteccion de informaciones militares con Japon y aumentar de una a 3 las lineas telefonicas directas con este pais isla para el mismo fin.
					
					En un comentario individual transmitido el dia 6, el diario Rodong Sinmun denuncia que esos acuerdos significan los preparativos para la guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea siendo confabulacion peligrosa que acarrea el nubarron de guerra a la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					En particular, forma parte del establecimiento de la alianza militar tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea orientado a implementar la estrategia de dominar el Nordeste Asiatico al invadir con fuerzas armadas a la RPDC y formar el cerco sobre los paises vecinos, precisa el comentarista y continua:
					
					Cada vez que se le daba la oportunidad, el mandatario surcoreano hablaba de "no a la guerra", "solucion pacifica" y "no a la alianza militar tripartita", lo cual no fue mas que una farsa barata para enganar la opinion publica interna y externa y encubrir su naturaleza belicosa.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben pensar en serio en las catastroficas consecuencias de sus multiples crimenes antinacionales.
